title: LF NZ based summoners for a plat + team
body:
Hey guys! 

I am looking to create a plat+ team to play together regularly and to compete in tournaments for the remainder of this season and for next season (both online and NZ based). 

If you are interested, reply to this post with info including:

Role:
Rank:
Best 5 champs:
Availability:
Why you want to join a team:

If you have any questions or want to talk about this more, feel free to [join this discord](https://discord.gg/gKmBGNC)

replies.body:
Role: Mid/Top
Rank: D4
Best 5 champs: Casseopia, Syndra, Fizz, Lucian, Orianna
Availability: Available 10am-12pm all days 
Why you want to join a team: I recently took a month or so break from league and have been slowly trying to play more and the idea of joining a team when I read it sparked my drive back up to start playing the game again whether or not I even get on a team
